messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=dd0a97869e4d ***

A+C: add Joakim Sernbrant

R=golang-dev, nigeltao
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6476043

LGTM

CL description should say "(individual CLA)".

Ian

On Tue, Aug 21, 2012 at 5:59 PM,  <adg@golang.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
